answers.answer: My doctor always ask me if I have that, sign of pre eclampsia!
What she said I would go in and make sure
Preeclampsia or gallstones can too. Let your doc check it out, indeed. If it's the latter,
best stay away from fatty foods, cofee, chocolate...

question: It's so uncomfortable and it's been going on for about 30 min now. I've tried walking but it makes me cripple over sometimes. I tried laying down and it still hurts. Tried drinking water. I can feel her move still though.  Has anyone experienced this? I'm 36 weeks
title: sharp pains in upper abdomen
